_documentation._note: UK English localization - uses i18next fallback inheritance
_documentation._fallbackBehavior: All undefined keys automatically fallback to en-US
_documentation._whenToAddKeys: Only add keys here when UK spelling/phrasing differs from US

_examples.spelling: analyze → analyse, customize → customise, organization → organisation
_examples.phrasing: trash → bin, apartment → flat, elevator → lift

_documentation._currentStatus: Current pricing content is spelling-neutral - no UK variants needed. Features are the same for both locales.
